title: Signs you are the problem in your relationship
text: You have been in a series of failed relationships. In fact, there's a pattern you could see - it all starts like a dream which then crashes in no time. While you may attribute this to you falling for men you were incompatible with, but there can be another aspect to the story, which you are, in all probability, glossing over. Maybe you had been the problem in your relationships all along. No, we are not asking you to recriminate yourself. The thing is, if you are honest to yourself or if you can mend those parts in you that are holding you back from sustaining your relationships, then you can lay the foundation for a solid love affair in the years to come. Here are some signs that show you could be the whole problem in your relationship:Your partner is always nervous about how you would react to a certain thing. It's like he's always walking on egg shells with you. You may take some things very calmly, while you may react aggressively to other. But the point is, your partner can never predict your responses.That's a common mistake people make in relationships. Ask yourself, do you always insist on having your way with respect to every petty issue that comes to the fore? Are you in favour of taking unilateral decisions? If yes, then it's a toxic approach.You can be super secretive. In fact, you don't think twice about withholding vital information from your partner. You do it on purpose, to keep him on tenterhooks. If that is not toxic, what is?
description: You may blame your partner for whatever goes wrong in your relationship. But try to look within as well. Read the signs.
